summary: 45,000 MILES. AIR CONDITIONER STARTS BLOWING WARM AIR ABOUT A MONTH AGO. THE FOLLOWING WEEK, TAKE THE PICKUP TO THE LOCAL DEALERSHIP TO DIAGNOSE THE FOLLOWING. CONDENSER IS LEAKING. INFORMED THAT THE PART IS ON A NATIONAL BACKORDER AND THEY WILL CALL ME WHEN IT COMES IN. THREE WEEKS AND COUNTING SO FAR. I LIVE IN THE SOUTHWEST SO THE TEMPERATURES HAVE BEEN VERY HOT LATELY AS THIS IS THE HOTTEST PART OF THE YEAR.
